ygData.subject: Re: Re: Some Thoughts (please read)
ygData.msgSnippet: On a whim, an enchanter and bard I regularly group with went to Lavastorm. We were all 17th level at the time.  We found it tough going at first mainly because
ygData.messageBody:
On a whim, an enchanter and bard I regularly group with went to Lavastorm.
We were all 17th level at the time. We found it tough going at first mainly
because everytime we hit (and we monks do that a lot) most of the creatures
there we were taking damage (darn shields).

We now spend most of our time in Najena and tend to group with others our
level and up to maybe level 22. We have the occassional bad situation but
for the most part we are able to control the first third of the area.

Last night was probably the worst. I was escorting someone to the zone and
it seemed like everything came at us. We had 2 ogre guards, 4 earth
elementals, 2 mist elementals, 1 fire elemental, probably 6 greater
skeletons, a magician and her pet and to top it off a terror tentacle
beating on us. We almost got them all. Mental Note: Feign Death is less
likely to work when there are 5-6 mobs hitting/casting on you at the same
time. This situation is pretty rare I have found.

If you can bring along someone to 'cancel magic' when there is a shield, or
root the runners/blast the runners both Lavastorm and Najena can be lots of
fun.

I digressed a bit. Sorry. Point is, we keep on coming back to Lavastorm
and Najena.


>From: "Tom De Vries" <tdevries@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
>To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Re: Some Thoughts (please read)
>Date: Fri, 29 Oct 1999 12:30:55 -0500
>
>I also am level 17... I was hoping to find somewhere new, besides EK, WK,
>etc.... Is Lavastorm a reasonable place for a level 17 to hunt? According
>to Eq-lozer it is 10 - 20 ... does anyone have any suggestions if I am
>heading that way?
>
>Ratziel - Fennin Ro
>
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Worlord <worlord99@...>
>To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
>Sent: Friday, October 29, 1999 11:32 AM
>Subject: [EQ-Monks] Re: Some Thoughts (please read)
>
>
> > From: Worlord <worlord99@...>
> >
> > On a starting point I am a level 17 monk of Quellious
> >
> > On the Blind issue: Everyone complains about this...
> > yet I don't seem to see the problem. Perhaps it is
> > because I learn zones quickly and generally always
> > know where I am. Buy a greater lightstone, memorize
> > the zone you are in, max out sense heading and always
> > know which way to run. Thats the best advice I can
> > give. I have a druid with infravision and it doesn't
> > seem to be much of an improvement (still can't see
> > anything in Misty Thicket)
> >
> > Just live with it
> >
> >
> > Second... I am level 17, i've been hunt in oasis for 3
> > levels and I want to go somewhere else. I was
> > thinking of East Karana. Any recommendations as to
> > where I should hunt and what I should fight
> >
> >
> > Hammeron
> > 17th Circle
> > Monk of Quellious
> > Karana
> >
><< text3.html >>
